text: Zavyalovsky District () is an administrativeLaw #28-ZS and municipalLaw #46-ZS district (raion), one of the fifty-nine in Altai Krai, Russia. It is located in the northwestern central part of the krai. The area of the district is . Its administrative center is the rural locality (a selo) of Zavyalovo. Population: The population of Zavyalovo accounts for 35.9% of the district's total population. ==References== ===Notes=== ===Sources=== * * Category:Districts of Altai Krai
title: Zavyalovsky District, Altai Krai
